summary: An ordinance providing for the construction of watermains in the area bounded on the north by a line 100 feet north of the north margin of Southern Street; on the east by the Duwamish Waterway; on the south by a line 100 feet south of the south margin of Southern Street; and on the west by the City Limits of the City of Seattle; making an appropriation from the surplus in the Water Fund therefor and providing for repayment of construction costs by users of water.
